rows.label: tlk43500147_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear there's this Blade called the
Holy Grail that's been resurrected.

rows.label: tlk43500147_01_msg0002
rows.name:
If the program at Mymoma Playhouse
is anything to go by, it's the one that
destroyed Alst 500 years ago.

rows.label: tlk43500147_01_msg0003
rows.name:
There's been a public notice issued
by the Invidian army about it, telling
us to stay vigilant.

rows.label: tlk43500147_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Apparently we're to be on the lookout
for a green Core Crystal...

rows.label: tlk43500147_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Hmm. Well, I'm not going to bother
much about it.
